p: After 7 days, the percentages of carvacrol present in the emulsions were ranged from 25.6% to 100.00%. Maximum carvacrol content was observed in the formulations F2 [97.38%] and F10 [100.00%]. Regarding the content of carvacrol after 180 days, an important decrease was observed. The content reduction ranged from 50.3% to 89.6%, for formulations F8 and F11, respectively.
